sum(increase(dse_table_repair_jobs_completed_total{instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table"}[$rate])) by (table, $by)

sum(idelta(dse_streaming_incoming_bytes_total{instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(idelta(dse_streaming_outgoing_bytes_total{instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack"}[$rate])) by ($by)
avg(dse_cache_hit_rate{instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", cache_name="chunk_cache"}) by ($by)
dse_cache_hit_rate{ cache_name="counter_cache"}
avg(dse_cache_hit_rate{instance=~"$instance", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", cache_name="key_cache"}) by ($by)
sum(rate(dse_thread_pools_completed_tasks{pool_name=~"tpc_.*", cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", instance=~"$instance"}[$rate])) by (pool_name, $by)
sum(rate(dse_thread_pools_pending_tasks{pool_name=~"tpc_.*", rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[$rate])) by (pool_name, $by)
sum(rate(dse_thread_pools_currently_blocked_tasks_total{pool_name=~"tpc_.*", rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[$rate])) by (pool_name, $by)
sum(dse_thread_pools_total_backpressure_counted_tasks_gauge{rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) by ($by)
sum(dse_thread_pools_total_backpressure_delayed_tasks_gauge{rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}) by ($by)
sum(rate(dse_thread_pools_active_tasks{pool_name=~"tpc_.*read.*", rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[$rate])) by (pool_name, $by)
sum(rate(dse_thread_pools_active_tasks{pool_name=~"tpc_.*write.*", rack=~"$rack", dc=~"$dc", cluster=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[$rate])) by (pool_name, $by)
